summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer, , and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation. Those features have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer, IMFMediaEngine and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Defines flags used by the method to control which speakers, if any, each auxiliary channel is downmixed to.

member.name: DVD_KARAOKE_DOWNMIX.DVD_Mix_2to0
member.summary: Downmix channel 2 to the left speaker.

member.name: DVD_KARAOKE_DOWNMIX.DVD_Mix_3to0
member.summary: Downmix channel 3 to the left speaker.

member.name: DVD_KARAOKE_DOWNMIX.DVD_Mix_4to0
member.summary: Downmix channel 4 to the left speaker.

member.name: DVD_KARAOKE_DOWNMIX.DVD_Mix_2to1
member.summary: Downmix channel 2 to the right speaker.

member.name: DVD_KARAOKE_DOWNMIX.DVD_Mix_3to1
member.summary: Downmix channel 3 to the right speaker.

member.name: DVD_KARAOKE_DOWNMIX.DVD_Mix_4to1
member.summary: Downmix channel 4 to the right speaker.
